title: Launcher Client is automatically set to PBE.
body:
I opened up the LoL launcher, and the region was automatically set to PBE, and started to update itself. My problem is that this isn't the PBE launcher, and it won't let me change the region to anything other than PBE. What is happening here? 

(Linked is a screenshot of what I'm seeing)

replies.body:
Hey Gnomeblaster, 

You should check out [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/YF5Xt191-why-is-the-patcher-showing-pbe-i-clicked-on-the-live-client) where Elduris explains how you can resolve this problem!

Thanks for the help. Somehow I had missed this thread when browsing for an answer. 

Cheers!

~Gnomeblaster
